title: Let me pay for Firefox
author: csmantle
aiHeadline: Firefox finally asks for donations, because apparently 'just using it' wasn't enough to save the internet.

title: Reading Neuromancer for the first time in 2025
author: keiferski
aiHeadline: In 2025, someone finally reads Neuromancer and realizes we're all just living in a giant Matrix... or maybe that's just the plot.

title: How does a screen work?
author: chkhd
aiHeadline: In 2025, we're still trying to figure out how screens work, because apparently, staring at them all day doesn't count as learning.

title: GLP-1s Are Breaking Life Insurance
author: alexslobodnik
aiHeadline: GLP-1s are breaking life insurance, proving that sometimes saving your life can be a death blow to your wallet.

title: The North Korean fake IT worker problem is ubiquitous
author: rntn
aiHeadline: North Korea's fake IT workers are everywhere, proving that even in the digital age, you can't trust anyone... especially if they're from North Korea.
